resources.string: This application is just a database with pictures and quotes from the "JoJo Bizzare Adventure".
All rights on the pictures and audio belong to:
I am just a student and a big fan of Hirohiko Araki. This app is only my hobby, I earn almost nothing from it.
One tap on the sound will play it. If sound is playing, taping any sound will stop current from playing. Try to search pewdiepie for an easter egg.
First aid when smth is bugged. Restart the app AFTER THE SOUND.
